HYdras:

"LAtely Unicron 's minions have been too quiet"Hissed Hydras "Too =
quiet for my taste... and that isnt good. After a short visit that they did=
 to my Forstress, they have gone and Leave Blackfortress's area"

 Kraftlos 
Sent: Sunday, March 01, 2009 5:25 AM
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com =

Subject: Re: Alliance?


"Good now that we have this alliance settled, its=
 time to start the hunt." said Perseus, satisfied that this alliance would =
be honored.  "Do you have an intelligence information as to the locations o=
f Unicronian operations?  I think we need to purge this planet first before=
 we consider any strikes on their orbital bases."
